name: Risky Game
description:
Stop the aliens & evil octopus from destroying Los Angeles in this arcade game based on TRUTH's latest single, "RISKY"!

Developer Credit: @BradyInstead

GIVEAWAY DESCRIPTION

GRAND PRIZE GIVEAWAY: we will be giving away a DDD grand prize package to the player with the highest score on Tuesday, January 14th. A valid email is required.

• 1x Custom DDD "Skull" 16GB USB with the full DDD discography
• 1x "The Unexpected" EP Vinyl
• 1x "Hollow World" LP Vinyl
• 1x Reflective Windbreaker (1/15 printed)
• 1x Gold DDD Soccer Jersey
• 1x Truth Snapback
• 1x Truth Beanie
• 1x DDD Socks
• 1x DDD Fanny-pack
• 1x Gold-Pin
• Sticker Pack
